name: Gin Rummy
tagline: An open-source Gin Rummy card game written in Java.
body:
# What is Gin Rummy?

Gin Rummy is a classic two person card game.

Check out the rules [here](http://rummy.com/ginrummy.html), and learn more about the game [here](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gin_rummy).

## Contribute an AI

This game is incomplete! While the framework for the game is finished, the game could really use some stellar AIs. If you are interested in AI, this would be a great project to contribute to! To get started, take a look at the classes `AIEngine`, `AIBrain`, `BasicAI`, and `SmartAI`.

## Authors
Alexander Verge

Andrew Martin

Joel Cheverie
